Study.Citation:
Coelho, G.L.D.H., Hanel, P.H.P, & Wolf, L.J. (2018). The
Very Efficient Assessment of Need for Cognition: Developing a Six-Item
Version. Assessment, online first, 1-16. Download here.

License.en: Freely available for research purposes (verify with original publication)
License.de: Frei verfügbar für Forschungszwecke (mit Originalpublikation überprüfen)

Instructions.en: Please read each statement and select the response that best describes you.
Instructions.de: Bitte lesen Sie jede Aussage und wählen Sie die Antwort, die Sie am besten beschreibt.

Description.en: I would prefer complex to simple problems.
I like to have the responsibility of handling a situation that requires a lot of thinking.
I really enjoy a task that involves coming up with new solutions to problems.
I would prefer a task that is intellectual, difficult, and important to one that is somewhat important but does not require much thought.
